name: Rivals: An Endless Duel KITBASHED Edition
name_original: Rivals: An Endless Duel KITBASHED Edition
description:
A storytelling and role playing game for two players.

Step into the roles of two rival mech pilots on opposite sides of a brutal war. Tell a story, fight for your lives, decide you destiny. 

Don't you want to turn the gears of history with your own hands?

A special edition of the original Rivals: An Endless Duel that introduces an exciting new game mechanic; cool robot toys put together and take apart!

Both editions of the game are available here for the price of one.
